exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce monotonic to an evaluable reference.

exceptions.tactic: intros A X Y TX TY F HF R S H1 H2.
intros A' X Y TX TY F HF R S H1 H2.
intros A' X' Y TX TY F HF R S H1 H2.
intros A' X' Y' TX TY F HF R S H1 H2.
intros A' X' Y' TX' TY F HF R S H1 H2.
intros A' X' Y' TX' TY' F HF R S H1 H2.
intros A' X' Y' TX' TY' F' HF R S H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y F, G : function X Y n : nat mon_m : increasing G mon_t : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (G R) (G S) mon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (G R) (G S) mon_m0 : increasing F mon_t0 : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S) mon_a0 : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) Unable to unify "increasing G" with "increasing (fun R : relation2 X Y => UExp F R n)".
The reference HF was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y F, G : function X Y n : nat mon_m : increasing G mon_t : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (G R) (G S) mon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (G R) (G S) mon_m0 : increasing F mon_t0 : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S) mon_a0 : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) Unable to unify "forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (G R) (G S)" with "forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (UExp F R n) (UExp F S n)".
The reference HF was not found in the current environment.
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y F, G : function X Y n : nat mon_m : increasing G mon_t : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (G R) (G S) mon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (G R) (G S) mon_m0 : increasing F mon_t0 : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S) mon_a0 : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) Unable to unify "forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (G R) (G S)" with "forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (UExp F R n) (UExp F S n)".
The reference HF was not found in the current environment.
The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros n. unfold monotonic. intros A X Y TX TY F HF R S H1 H2. apply mkmon. - apply mon_m. apply HF. - apply mon_t. apply HF. apply H1. - apply mon_a. apply HF. apply H2.
